1#ifndef OT_GLYF_VARCOMPOSITEGLYPH_HH
2#define OT_GLYF_VARCOMPOSITEGLYPH_HH
3
4
5#include "../../hb-open-type.hh"
6#include "coord-setter.hh"
7
8
9namespace OT {
10namespace glyf_impl {
11
12
13struct VarCompositeGlyphRecord
14{
15 protected:
16 enum var_composite_glyph_flag_t
17 {
18 USE_MY_METRICS = 0x0001,
19 AXIS_INDICES_ARE_SHORT = 0x0002,
20 UNIFORM_SCALE = 0x0004,
21 HAVE_TRANSLATE_X = 0x0008,
22 HAVE_TRANSLATE_Y = 0x0010,
23 HAVE_ROTATION = 0x0020,
24 HAVE_SCALE_X = 0x0040,
25 HAVE_SCALE_Y = 0x0080,
26 HAVE_SKEW_X = 0x0100,
27 HAVE_SKEW_Y = 0x0200,
28 HAVE_TCENTER_X = 0x0400,
29 HAVE_TCENTER_Y = 0x0800,
30 GID_IS_24 = 0x1000,
31 AXES_HAVE_VARIATION = 0x2000,
32 RESET_UNSPECIFIED_AXES = 0x4000,
33 };
34
35 public:
36
37 unsigned int get_size () const
38 {
39 unsigned int size = min_size;
40
41 unsigned axis_width = (flags & AXIS_INDICES_ARE_SHORT) ? 4 : 3;
42 size += numAxes * axis_width;
43
44 // gid
45 size += 2;
46 if (flags & GID_IS_24) size += 1;
47
48 if (flags & HAVE_TRANSLATE_X) size += 2;
49 if (flags & HAVE_TRANSLATE_Y) size += 2;
50 if (flags & HAVE_ROTATION) size += 2;
51 if (flags & HAVE_SCALE_X) size += 2;
52 if (flags & HAVE_SCALE_Y) size += 2;
53 if (flags & HAVE_SKEW_X) size += 2;
54 if (flags & HAVE_SKEW_Y) size += 2;
55 if (flags & HAVE_TCENTER_X) size += 2;
56 if (flags & HAVE_TCENTER_Y) size += 2;
57
58 return size;
59 }
60
61 bool has_more () const { return true; }
62
63 bool is_use_my_metrics () const { return flags & USE_MY_METRICS; }
64 bool is_reset_unspecified_axes () const { return flags & RESET_UNSPECIFIED_AXES; }
65
66 hb_codepoint_t get_gid () const
67 {
68 if (flags & GID_IS_24)
69 return StructAfter<const HBGlyphID24> (X: numAxes);
70 else
71 return StructAfter<const HBGlyphID16> (X: numAxes);
72 }
73
74 unsigned get_numAxes () const
75 {
76 return numAxes;
77 }
78
79 unsigned get_num_points () const
80 {
81 unsigned num = 0;
82 if (flags & AXES_HAVE_VARIATION) num += numAxes;
83 if (flags & (HAVE_TRANSLATE_X | HAVE_TRANSLATE_Y)) num++;
84 if (flags & HAVE_ROTATION) num++;
85 if (flags & (HAVE_SCALE_X | HAVE_SCALE_Y)) num++;
86 if (flags & (HAVE_SKEW_X | HAVE_SKEW_Y)) num++;
87 if (flags & (HAVE_TCENTER_X | HAVE_TCENTER_Y)) num++;
88 return num;
89 }
90
91 void transform_points (hb_array_t<contour_point_t> record_points,
92 contour_point_vector_t &points) const
93 {
94 float matrix[4];
95 contour_point_t trans;
96
97 get_transformation_from_points (rec_points: record_points, matrix, trans);
98
99 points.transform (matrix);
100 points.translate (delta: trans);
101 }
102
103 static inline void transform (float (&matrix)[4], contour_point_t &trans,
104 float (other)[6])
105 {
106 // https://github.com/fonttools/fonttools/blob/f66ee05f71c8b57b5f519ee975e95edcd1466e14/Lib/fontTools/misc/transform.py#L268
107 float xx1 = other[0];
108 float xy1 = other[1];
109 float yx1 = other[2];
110 float yy1 = other[3];
111 float dx1 = other[4];
112 float dy1 = other[5];
113 float xx2 = matrix[0];
114 float xy2 = matrix[1];
115 float yx2 = matrix[2];
116 float yy2 = matrix[3];
117 float dx2 = trans.x;
118 float dy2 = trans.y;
119
120 matrix[0] = xx1*xx2 + xy1*yx2;
121 matrix[1] = xx1*xy2 + xy1*yy2;
122 matrix[2] = yx1*xx2 + yy1*yx2;
123 matrix[3] = yx1*xy2 + yy1*yy2;
124 trans.x = xx2*dx1 + yx2*dy1 + dx2;
125 trans.y = xy2*dx1 + yy2*dy1 + dy2;
126 }
127
128 static void translate (float (&matrix)[4], contour_point_t &trans,
129 float translateX, float translateY)
130 {
131 // https://github.com/fonttools/fonttools/blob/f66ee05f71c8b57b5f519ee975e95edcd1466e14/Lib/fontTools/misc/transform.py#L213
132 float other[6] = {1.f, 0.f, 0.f, 1.f, translateX, translateY};
133 transform (matrix, trans, other);
134 }
135
136 static void scale (float (&matrix)[4], contour_point_t &trans,
137 float scaleX, float scaleY)
138 {
139 // https://github.com/fonttools/fonttools/blob/f66ee05f71c8b57b5f519ee975e95edcd1466e14/Lib/fontTools/misc/transform.py#L224
140 float other[6] = {scaleX, 0.f, 0.f, scaleY, 0.f, 0.f};
141 transform (matrix, trans, other);
142 }
143
144 static void rotate (float (&matrix)[4], contour_point_t &trans,
145 float rotation)
146 {
147 // https://github.com/fonttools/fonttools/blob/f66ee05f71c8b57b5f519ee975e95edcd1466e14/Lib/fontTools/misc/transform.py#L240
148 rotation = rotation * float (M_PI);
149 float c = cosf (x: rotation);
150 float s = sinf (x: rotation);
151 float other[6] = {c, s, -s, c, 0.f, 0.f};
152 transform (matrix, trans, other);
153 }
154
155 static void skew (float (&matrix)[4], contour_point_t &trans,
156 float skewX, float skewY)
157 {
158 // https://github.com/fonttools/fonttools/blob/f66ee05f71c8b57b5f519ee975e95edcd1466e14/Lib/fontTools/misc/transform.py#L255
159 skewX = skewX * float (M_PI);
160 skewY = skewY * float (M_PI);
161 float other[6] = {1.f, tanf (x: skewY), tanf (x: skewX), 1.f, 0.f, 0.f};
162 transform (matrix, trans, other);
163 }
164
165 bool get_points (contour_point_vector_t &points) const
166 {
167 float translateX = 0.f;
168 float translateY = 0.f;
169 float rotation = 0.f;
170 float scaleX = 1.f * (1 << 10);
171 float scaleY = 1.f * (1 << 10);
172 float skewX = 0.f;
173 float skewY = 0.f;
174 float tCenterX = 0.f;
175 float tCenterY = 0.f;
176
177 if (unlikely (!points.resize (points.length + get_num_points ()))) return false;
178
179 unsigned axis_width = (flags & AXIS_INDICES_ARE_SHORT) ? 2 : 1;
180 unsigned axes_size = numAxes * axis_width;
181
182 const F2DOT14 *q = (const F2DOT14 *) (axes_size +
183 (flags & GID_IS_24 ? 3 : 2) +
184 &StructAfter<const HBUINT8> (X: numAxes));
185
186 hb_array_t<contour_point_t> rec_points = points.as_array ().sub_array (start_offset: points.length - get_num_points ());
187
188 unsigned count = numAxes;
189 if (flags & AXES_HAVE_VARIATION)
190 {
191 for (unsigned i = 0; i < count; i++)
192 rec_points[i].x = q++->to_int ();
193 rec_points += count;
194 }
195 else
196 q += count;
197
198 const HBUINT16 *p = (const HBUINT16 *) q;
199
200 if (flags & HAVE_TRANSLATE_X) translateX = * (const FWORD *) p++;
201 if (flags & HAVE_TRANSLATE_Y) translateY = * (const FWORD *) p++;
202 if (flags & HAVE_ROTATION) rotation = ((const F4DOT12 *) p++)->to_int ();
203 if (flags & HAVE_SCALE_X) scaleX = ((const F6DOT10 *) p++)->to_int ();
204 if (flags & HAVE_SCALE_Y) scaleY = ((const F6DOT10 *) p++)->to_int ();
205 if (flags & HAVE_SKEW_X) skewX = ((const F4DOT12 *) p++)->to_int ();
206 if (flags & HAVE_SKEW_Y) skewY = ((const F4DOT12 *) p++)->to_int ();
207 if (flags & HAVE_TCENTER_X) tCenterX = * (const FWORD *) p++;
208 if (flags & HAVE_TCENTER_Y) tCenterY = * (const FWORD *) p++;
209
210 if ((flags & UNIFORM_SCALE) && !(flags & HAVE_SCALE_Y))
211 scaleY = scaleX;
212
213 if (flags & (HAVE_TRANSLATE_X | HAVE_TRANSLATE_Y))
214 {
215 rec_points[0].x = translateX;
216 rec_points[0].y = translateY;
217 rec_points++;
218 }
219 if (flags & HAVE_ROTATION)
220 {
221 rec_points[0].x = rotation;
222 rec_points++;
223 }
224 if (flags & (HAVE_SCALE_X | HAVE_SCALE_Y))
225 {
226 rec_points[0].x = scaleX;
227 rec_points[0].y = scaleY;
228 rec_points++;
229 }
230 if (flags & (HAVE_SKEW_X | HAVE_SKEW_Y))
231 {
232 rec_points[0].x = skewX;
233 rec_points[0].y = skewY;
234 rec_points++;
235 }
236 if (flags & (HAVE_TCENTER_X | HAVE_TCENTER_Y))
237 {
238 rec_points[0].x = tCenterX;
239 rec_points[0].y = tCenterY;
240 rec_points++;
241 }
242 assert (!rec_points);
243
244 return true;
245 }
246
247 void get_transformation_from_points (hb_array_t<contour_point_t> rec_points,
248 float (&matrix)[4], contour_point_t &trans) const
249 {
250 if (flags & AXES_HAVE_VARIATION)
251 rec_points += numAxes;
252
253 matrix[0] = matrix[3] = 1.f;
254 matrix[1] = matrix[2] = 0.f;
255 trans.init (x_: 0.f, y_: 0.f);
256
257 float translateX = 0.f;
258 float translateY = 0.f;
259 float rotation = 0.f;
260 float scaleX = 1.f;
261 float scaleY = 1.f;
262 float skewX = 0.f;
263 float skewY = 0.f;
264 float tCenterX = 0.f;
265 float tCenterY = 0.f;
266
267 if (flags & (HAVE_TRANSLATE_X | HAVE_TRANSLATE_Y))
268 {
269 translateX = rec_points[0].x;
270 translateY = rec_points[0].y;
271 rec_points++;
272 }
273 if (flags & HAVE_ROTATION)
274 {
275 rotation = rec_points[0].x / (1 << 12);
276 rec_points++;
277 }
278 if (flags & (HAVE_SCALE_X | HAVE_SCALE_Y))
279 {
280 scaleX = rec_points[0].x / (1 << 10);
281 scaleY = rec_points[0].y / (1 << 10);
282 rec_points++;
283 }
284 if (flags & (HAVE_SKEW_X | HAVE_SKEW_Y))
285 {
286 skewX = rec_points[0].x / (1 << 12);
287 skewY = rec_points[0].y / (1 << 12);
288 rec_points++;
289 }
290 if (flags & (HAVE_TCENTER_X | HAVE_TCENTER_Y))
291 {
292 tCenterX = rec_points[0].x;
293 tCenterY = rec_points[0].y;
294 rec_points++;
295 }
296 assert (!rec_points);
297
298 translate (matrix, trans, translateX: translateX + tCenterX, translateY: translateY + tCenterY);
299 rotate (matrix, trans, rotation);
300 scale (matrix, trans, scaleX, scaleY);
301 skew (matrix, trans, skewX: -skewX, skewY);
302 translate (matrix, trans, translateX: -tCenterX, translateY: -tCenterY);
303 }
304
305 void set_variations (coord_setter_t &setter,
306 hb_array_t<contour_point_t> rec_points) const
307 {
308 bool have_variations = flags & AXES_HAVE_VARIATION;
309 unsigned axis_width = (flags & AXIS_INDICES_ARE_SHORT) ? 2 : 1;
310
311 const HBUINT8 *p = (const HBUINT8 *) (((HBUINT8 *) &numAxes) + numAxes.static_size + (flags & GID_IS_24 ? 3 : 2));
312 const HBUINT16 *q = (const HBUINT16 *) (((HBUINT8 *) &numAxes) + numAxes.static_size + (flags & GID_IS_24 ? 3 : 2));
313
314 const F2DOT14 *a = (const F2DOT14 *) ((HBUINT8 *) (axis_width == 1 ? (p + numAxes) : (HBUINT8 *) (q + numAxes)));
315
316 unsigned count = numAxes;
317 for (unsigned i = 0; i < count; i++)
318 {
319 unsigned axis_index = axis_width == 1 ? (unsigned) *p++ : (unsigned) *q++;
320
321 signed v = have_variations ? rec_points[i].x : a++->to_int ();
322
323 v = hb_clamp (v, -(1<<14), (1<<14));
324 setter[axis_index] = v;
325 }
326 }
327
328 protected:
329 HBUINT16 flags;
330 HBUINT8 numAxes;
331 public:
332 DEFINE_SIZE_MIN (3);
333};
334
335using var_composite_iter_t = composite_iter_tmpl<VarCompositeGlyphRecord>;
336
337struct VarCompositeGlyph
338{
339 const GlyphHeader &header;
340 hb_bytes_t bytes;
341 VarCompositeGlyph (const GlyphHeader &header_, hb_bytes_t bytes_) :
342 header (header_), bytes (bytes_) {}
343
344 var_composite_iter_t iter () const
345 { return var_composite_iter_t (bytes, &StructAfter<VarCompositeGlyphRecord, GlyphHeader> (X: header)); }
346
347};
348
349
350} /* namespace glyf_impl */
351} /* namespace OT */
